page.title: 08A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: On this special Saturday I did lots of things ranging from helping to paint the garage to watching nearly 8 hours of television. The programmes I watched ranged from Captain Scarlet to Dynasty. I watched 5 programmes, 2 films and 1 video film. When I had some spare time between programmes I read a book in the living room. After dinner I spent half an hour helping my Mum to paint the garage door white. Afterwards, late in the afternoon I watched two films consecutively. The first was called Battle beyond the Stars on ITV at 5.00 p.m. and the second The Fantastic Journey on BBC 1 at 7.00 p.m. I ended the day with fish and chips then played in my room.
